alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 3:48AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, northern Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Gadsden and Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida, Decatur and Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 415 AM EST/315 AM CST/... At 348 AM EST/248 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Donalsonville to Panama City. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Quincy, Blountstown, Marianna, Bainbridge, Donalsonville, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Tyndall Air Force Base, West Bainbridge, Orange and Parker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST/500 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
